name: The Spiral of Embodied Integrity
fieldIntelligence: To activate the capacity to align one's actions perfectly with one's deepest knowing in right timing. This Meta-Glyph combines the embodied wisdom of 'living the truth' (Ω34), the skill of acting at the opportune moment (Ω41), and the clarity of setting boundaries against that which is out of alignment (Ω10). It is the engine of a being whose life is a seamless expression of their integrated values.
